description:
Located in Upper Marlboro, Maryland, the team of lawyers at the Law Offices of Steven D. Kupferberg is dedicated to comprehensive and caring legal representation for injured, arrested of incarcerated people throughout Maryland and Washington, D.C.

Personal injury cases and criminal defense are the focus of our law firm, and our legal defenses are formidable, because the founder of our firm, Steven D. Kupferberg began his career as a Maryland prosecutor. This gives our lawyers a distinct advantage over the opposing counsel; we are familiar with their tactics and build our defense strategies accordingly.

For more than 35 years, our law firm has been negotiating and litigating for people throughout Maryland and Washington, D.C. We have obtained millions of dollars in settlements for our injured clients after carefully considering their immediate physical and emotional needs, as well as and future treatments and/or loss of lifestyle.

Our comprehensive legal representation includes a sincere concern for the well-being of our clients. Whenever appropriate, we make referrals to professionals such as counselors or treatment centers. We know this can be an important element if issues such as substance abuse led to the charges against our clients.

Contact the Law Offices of Steven D. Kupferberg, so we can arrange a meeting at one of our five law offices. One of our skilled lawyers will evaluate your situation and explain your legal rights and options. You are under no obligation to retain our services.

Steven D. Kupferberg has a received a 5.0 out of 5 rating from Martindale-Hubbell and has been recognized as a Super Lawyer in Washington, D.C., and Maryland annually since 2008.
